definition: (old) combat robe/soldier's uniform/(sports) team jersey/team shirt
(fig.) to re-enter the fray/to return to a field of activity after a period of absence

sentences.english: Could Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink wear a Chelsea shirt again?
sentences.chinese: 哈賽爾巴因克能夠重披切爾西戰袍？

sentences.english: I also hope to recapture the Nazionale jersey too.
sentences.chinese: 我還希望自己能重新穿上國家隊的戰袍。

sentences.english: Ben makes out with a girl dressed up as the Pink Power Ranger at a Halloween party.
sentences.chinese: 本和在好萊塢派對上，穿着粉色金剛戰袍的女孩接吻。

sentences.english: I think I have very little chance of getting back into the Azzurri shirt.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲我重新披上藍衣戰袍的機會不大。

sentences.english: His next appearence, with Milan's shirt, will be the 50th.
sentences.chinese: 他的下一次出場，身着米蘭戰袍，將是第50場比賽。

sentences.english: "I think that was my best game to date in an England shirt, " said Defoe.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲這是我身披英格蘭戰袍打出的最好的比賽。

sentences.english: Fearsome warriors garbed in an outfit to resemble an eagle. Armoured with ichcahuipilli, and wielding maquahuitl clubs two-handed.
sentences.chinese: 雄鷹戰士身披雄鷹戰袍，使用長柄瑪喀霍特戰棍。

definition: black hat (worn by feudal official)/fig. official post
to apply makeup conspicuously (idiom)/dressed to the nines and wearing makeup
buttoned mandarin jacket of the Qing dynasty 清代[Qing1 dai4] (1644-1911)
cloth head covering worn by men in ancient times/headscarf (typically worn by women)/kerchief/turban
not care about one's appearance (idiom)/slovenly in dress and manner
